product_name: CamelBak Snoblast Hydration Snow Pack - Men's
long_description: With a clean, low-profile design, the Snoblast pack comfortably hauls your helmet, board and 2 liters of water, helping you transition easily from frontside cruising to backcountry bliss.
short_description: With a clean, low-profile design, the Snoblast pack comfortably hauls your helmet, board and 2 liters of water, helping you transition easily from frontside cruising to backcountry bliss.
